Replace.Text: Great Prince Shotoku, you have used the merits accumulated throughout your lifetimes to revitalize Japanese Buddhism. You have vowed to fulfill your wish and become the first person to illuminate the entire Asuka Age. Although forgotten, he still faces the world with love. No matter how bumpy the road ahead is, we believe that you will lead us into the golden age again.

Faith protection
+6 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when fighting occurs within the country's borders comes from unit-specific abilities

The temple where the Son of God Feng Cong'er lived, Monobu Budu, Suwo Tuzi, Huo Qing'e and others also lived here. [NEWLINE]In the Temple of Gods game, the space inside the Dream Temple is the temple where the Son of God is located. [NEWLINE]After Shenzi was resurrected, he moved it away and built a new dojo in the fairyland he created. [NEWLINE] The fairy world opened by Shenzi is a different world independent of Gensokyo. Changes in Gensokyo will not affect the temple. [NEWLINE]For example, in the Deep Secret Record, the space transfer effect of the supernatural beads will not work in the temple. [NEWLINE] In addition, Shenzi can teleport to any place in Gensokyo through the fairy world. For example, she can open an entrance and exit under the floor tiles of Hakurei Shrine. [NEWLINE]In the temple of the gods, there are many disciples who worship the Son of God as their teacher and hope to learn immortal arts, but it seems that they are only used to do odd jobs.

The architectural shape of the temple is based on the Sentengu Shrine in Sakado City, Saitama Prefecture, Japan, and was built under the leadership of Taiwanese Kang Guodian. Completed in 1995, it is a temple dedicated to Sanqing Taoist ancestors and is the largest Taoist temple in Japan. [NEWLINE]You can see the three-story eaves that upturned to form an arc. There are clay sculptures of dragons, phoenixes and other auspicious animals on the eaves. [NEWLINE]There is a main entrance and two side entrances on the front of the temple, and there is a room on each side. [NEWLINE] There are bright and exquisite paintings on the pillars of the main entrance, and the eaves are covered with magnificent glazed tiles. [NEWLINE] There is a three-story octagonal tower on each side of the main entrance. Like the main entrance, it has red-painted pillars and is covered with golden tiles. There are also lanterns hanging on the tower under the eaves. [NEWLINE]The interior of the temple building has not been shown yet. There is a square paved with square bricks in front of the temple. [NEWLINE]According to Ci Gexian's comics, there are rocks and trees around the temple, and there is also a layer of fog. [NEWLINE]Similar to the fairy world of Hua Fan, the fairy world to which the temple belongs also has the distinction between day and night. At night, you can see a full moon in the sky.

Feng Conger Shenzi is an official character in the Touhou Project series. He first appeared in the Temple of the Gods of the East, the thirteenth game in the Touhou series, as a six-faced boss. [NEWLINE] The prototype of the design of Toyoko's son is based on the famous politician Prince Shotoku who worshiped Buddhism during the Asuka period in ancient Japan and left many anecdotes and legends. At the same time, the silhouette of the god's son also appeared in the temple. on the cover. [NEWLINE] Shenzi was a politician in the distant past. She was born in a stable and was recognized as a genius since she was a child. She is a super person who far surpasses humans. After becoming an immortal, her true strength is immeasurable. After her appearance, the balance of power in Gensokyo changed. The religion she represents in Gensokyo is Taoism, and her stance in Gensokyo is on the human side. [NEWLINE] Shenzi's character is unexpectedly free and frivolous, and he always loves to joke. But when you are face to face with her, not only is your fault easily exposed, you even feel like everything is being seen through, and it becomes more of a feeling of awe. [NEWLINE] He is upright in nature, averse to evil things and demons, and wants to eliminate evil in the world. He has a very strong sense of self-awareness and is concerned about the safety of the humans in Gensokyo and the entire Gensokyo. Like his religious rival Saint Byakuren, he deliberately makes himself look extraordinary, but Shenzi has a more superhuman feeling than Byakuren. [NEWLINE]Confident in myself. At the same time, she is surprisingly competitive, which can be seen from her performance in the Cool Danmaku Competition. [NEWLINE]After Temple of the Gods, it also appeared as a self-contained machine in fighting games such as Oriental Heart Qilou, and also appeared in official publications from time to time. [NEWLINE]

The temple where the resurrection was originally located was in Gensokyo. After the story of the temple, considering the evil spirit of Meurenji Temple, Shenzi opened up a fairyland of her own and moved the temple to this place and built it. The new dojo, where I practice most of the time since then. [NEWLINE] However, there are also many people in human villages who want to be her disciples and practice immortal arts. However, it seems that they are only used to do odd jobs. [NEWLINE]Although he has become a fairy that transcends mortals, he has not completely cut off contact with worldly affairs. He occasionally intervenes in human society, such as selling four monkey sauces and giving lectures. [NEWLINE] She will also investigate and solve some mutations (such as complete dependence mutations and urban legend mutations), and participate in the encirclement and suppression of good and evil ghosts.

I should have advised you on this kind of thing in advance, so feel free to do so.
This kind of thing is not allowed for the time being, let's move on to the next thing.
This is a gift to express our respect and we hope you can accept it.

When we first met, I was the son of Fengconger, the leader of the temple.
Why not come and visit each other's palace? It would be a good thing for both parties.
OK, all right.
We know very little about this world and need to travel more and learn more.
Hello, what's the matter?
We can form stronger relationships, even alliances.
Let’s end this battle first.
The armistice is still far away, please come back.
Stop it, it won't be good for us if we continue like this.
The border opening is not permanent, so I hope you can seize the opportunity.
No, there is no wiggle room.
We are just passing by, please don't panic.
The battle is a bit too big, I hope you can suppress your arrogance.
Our plans will not change, so this conversation will end here.
Okay, then according to your country's requirements, we will try to avoid it.
Failure is only temporary because the human heart is not destroyed.
This kind of transaction will make me suffer too much loss. Let's talk about it later.
This is a good deal, so let's sign the agreement.
